name: Pulsahr [LUDUM DARE 51]
description:
Story

The star is about to collapse, pushing heat waves, destroying everything. You need to reach the star with a special payload to save the planets' population. Scientists built a spaceship capable of using small black holes and wormholes to buy you some time. They also sent satellites to reload your gas on the way to the end.

Hint: Follow the blue arrow that appear at each checkpoint

Controls
  • Mouse -> Direction
  • Right Click -> Throttle up
  • Left Click -> Brake
  • R -> Respawn
Credits
  • Sun Shader : Panteleymonov
  • Background Shader : Pablo Roman Andrioli
  • Music : DANIELYAN ASHOT MAKICHEVICH

Engine : Godot
